name: Sword of Michael
description:
Sword Of Michael is a terrifying argument reality game by using hand interactions between a real printed magic book and virtual characters. With Leap Motion, Oculus rift and webcams, we let player become a wizard to eliminate the monsters comes from all directions in real world. Player is required to use the weapons that garb from the magic book to defeat them. Each of weapon's functionality is different, so player needs to pick up the right one. Let's begin the journey and be a master.
